Package gui.fontMeshCreator

Class MetaFile

java.lang.Object
gui.fontMeshCreator.MetaFile
public class MetaFile
extends java.lang.Object
Provides functionality for getting the values from a font file.
Author:
Karl

    Loads all the data about one character in the texture atlas and converts it all from 'pixels' to 'screen-space' before storing.

    Loads in data about each character and stores the data in the Character class.
    private void loadLineSizes()
    Loads information about the line height for this font in pixels, and uses this as a way to find the conversion rate between pixels in the texture atlas and screen-space.

    Loads the data about how much padding is used around each character in the texture atlas.

      protected Character getCharacter​(int ascii)

    • processNextLine

      private boolean processNextLine()
      Read in the next line and store the variable values.
      Returns:
      true if the end of the file hasn't been reached.

    • getValueOfVariable

      private int getValueOfVariable​(java.lang.String variable)
      Gets the int value of the variable with a certain name on the current line.
      Parameters:
      variable - - the name of the variable.
      Returns:
      The value of the variable.

    • getValuesOfVariable

      private int[] getValuesOfVariable​(java.lang.String variable)
      Gets the array of ints associated with a variable on the current line.
      Parameters:
      variable - - the name of the variable.
      Returns:
      The int array of values associated with the variable.

    • close

      private void close()
      Closes the font file after finishing reading.

    • openFile

      private void openFile​(MyFile file)
      Opens the font file, ready for reading.
      Parameters:
      file - - the font file.

    • loadPaddingData

      private void loadPaddingData()
      Loads the data about how much padding is used around each character in the texture atlas.

    • loadLineSizes

      private void loadLineSizes()
      Loads information about the line height for this font in pixels, and uses this as a way to find the conversion rate between pixels in the texture atlas and screen-space.

    • loadCharacterData

      private void loadCharacterData​(int imageWidth)
      Loads in data about each character and stores the data in the Character class.
      Parameters:
      imageWidth - - the width of the texture atlas in pixels.

    • loadCharacter

      private Character loadCharacter​(int imageSize)
      Loads all the data about one character in the texture atlas and converts it all from 'pixels' to 'screen-space' before storing. The effects of padding are also removed from the data.
      Parameters:
      imageSize - - the size of the texture atlas in pixels.
      Returns:
      The data about the character.
